mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bt_tb_file( origin_file_nm, save_file_nm, save_path, ext, size, ref_tbl, ref_pk, download_cnt, ord, reg_dt ) VALUES( #{origin_file_nm}, #{save_file_nm}, #{save_path}, #{ext}, #{size}, "bt_tb_board", #{ref_pk}, 0, #{ord}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT f.file_no, f.origin_file_nm, f.ord, f.save_path FROM bt_tb_file f JOIN bt_tb_board b ON f.ref_pk = b.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no}
SELECT save_path, origin_file_nm FROM bt_tb_file WHERE file_no = #{file_no}
